data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gillung, Jéssica Paula, Carvalho, Claudio José Barros De (2009): Acroceridae (Diptera): a pictorial key and diagnosis of the Brazilian genera. Zootaxa 2175: 29-41, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.189330
